md:
giải nghĩa từ "mastering" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Mastering (verb) /ˈmɑːstərɪŋ/:
	+ Meaning: to become very skilled or proficient at something, especially through practice or hard work.
	+ Vietnamese: thành thạo, nắm vững, làm chủ.
	+ Example sentence: "She spent years mastering the piano and is now a concert pianist."
	+ Related words: expert, proficient, skilled, adept.
	+ Antonyms: amateur, beginner, novice.

* Mastering (noun) /ˈmɑːstərɪŋ/:
	+ Meaning: the process of preparing a recording or a film for distribution or release.
	+ Vietnamese: quá trình hoàn thiện, quá trình chỉnh sửa.
	+ Example sentence: "The mastering process took several weeks to complete, but the final product was worth it."
	+ Related words: editing, mixing, production, post-production.
	+ Antonyms: none.

Note: The verb "mastering" is more commonly used than the noun "mastering".
html:

  • Mastering (noun) /ˈmɑːstərɪŋ/:

    • Meaning: the process of preparing a recording or a film for distribution or release.
    • Vietnamese: quá trình hoàn thiện, quá trình chỉnh sửa.
    • Example sentence: "The mastering process took several weeks to complete, but the final product was worth it."
    • Related words: editing, mixing, production, post-production.
    • Antonyms: none.

Note: The verb "mastering" is more commonly used than the noun "mastering".
